certificate_name: Export of products containing poultry ingredients with or without dairy ingredients to the USA

pages.title: What is your import permit number?

content.header: What is your import permit number?

pages.title: What is the origin of the product?

content.header: What is the origin of the product?
content.paragraph: You can enter more than one species
You can enter details of more than one establishment. Leave blank if not applicable.

fields.label: Name and address of the manufacturing establishment
fields.name: manufacture_establishment

pages.title: What are the details of your final product?

content.header: What are the details of your final product?

fields.label: Ingredients and processing method
fields.hint: List all ingredients present in the product and how it has been processed
fields.name: breed

content.paragraph: You can skip this question if you do not know this information yet. You may find it easier to send a schedule or packing list to your certifier before certification.

fields.label: Net weight of the consignment
fields.hint: Provide the number and the units of measurement. For example, 105kg
fields.name: net_weight_num

fields.label: Identification marks
fields.hint: Enter the serial and batch numbers. Multiple numbers can be comma separated.
fields.name: identification_marks

content.paragraph: If you are the exporter, provide your name or business name. If you are an agent representing someone else, provide their name or business name.

fields.label: Name and address of the exporter
fields.name: exporter_details

pages.title: How will the consignment be transported?

content.header: How will the consignment be transported?

fields.label: Means of transport
fields.hint: Enter the method of travel and the identification of the transport. For example aeroplane ZZ1234
fields.name: consignment_package-number

pages.title: Where is the consignment being sent to?

content.header: Where is the consignment being sent to?

fields.label: Place of unloading within the destination country
fields.name: place_unloading
fields.default: ABC limited Australia, 637 Rowley Street, Melbourne, CIC2002

fields.label: Address of premises of destination
fields.hint: Leave blank if no agent has been used
fields.name: consignee_representive

content.paragraph: Provide details of the person the consignment will be shipped to, or their representative.

fields.label: Name and address of consignee
fields.name: consignee_details
fields.default: ABC limited Australia, 637 Rowley Street, Melbourne, CIC2002

fields.label: Certification region
fields.hint: Select the region in which the certification will take place:
fields.name: certification_place

pages.title: What is the planned date of certification?

content.header: What is the planned date of certification?

pages.title: What is the planned date of export?

content.header: What is the planned date of export?
content.paragraph: This is the date that the consignment leaves the loading premises  This may not the same date that it leaves the UK.
